animeTitle: I, The Public Enemy of The World of Immortality
otherNames: I The Public Enemy of The World of Immortality, 我 修仙界的公敌
synopsis: Li Wuwang suddenly awakens one day and finds himself as a villain, holding Wanchao Sect’s Saint Wan Zheng hostage and fleeing. Before Li Wuwang can react, the “system” in front of him quickly issues a task to him: deprive the destiny of the person with destiny. Either complete the task and survive, or fail the task and become the one who died in the destiny.
